LanguageData.Ammo_RPG32Rocket_HEAT.label: RPG-32 grenade (HEAT)
LanguageData.Ammo_RPG32Rocket_HEAT.description: Rocket-propelled grenade designed for the RPG-32 launcher. After being fired, a rocket motor kicks in to propel the grenade further.
LanguageData.Ammo_RPG32Rocket_Thermobaric.label: RPG-32 grenade (Thermobaric)
LanguageData.Ammo_RPG32Rocket_Thermobaric.description: Rocket-propelled grenade designed for the RPG-32 launcher. After being fired, a rocket motor kicks in to propel the grenade further.
LanguageData.Bullet_RPG32Rocket_HEAT.label: RPG-32 grenade (HEAT)
LanguageData.Bullet_RPG32Rocket_Thermobaric.label: RPG-32 grenade (Thermobaric)
